Meetings & Private Events

Begin Mini-Page 605769
Meetings & Events
With its timeless elegance and unfailing grace, The Vinoy has been an
accomplished host for events of all types and sizes for a
century. Be it a grand gala, an inspiring
corporate meeting, or a romantic wedding, The Vinoyʼs four magnificent ballrooms,
spectacular outdoor spaces, flexible meeting rooms, and unrivaled
expertise make every occasion memorable.
Vinoy Club Members are given special, priority booking for elegant, entertaining events as well as access to audiovisual equipment rental, customizable catering menus, a dedicated professional meeting coordinator and more than 63,000 sq. ft. of total event space,
you can plan the event of your dreams at The Vinoy.
For Business Services & Meeting information please
click here
For Wedding & Social Event information please
click here
Contact (727) 894-1000 for more information.
End Mini-Page 605769
End Dynamic Page / ID: 407232

About St. Petersburg
End Mini-Page 605696
Begin Mini-Page 605697
About St. Petersburg
The Vinoy embodies the city’s unique charisma and vibrant spirit,
offering guests a refined gateway to new experiences. Delivering rich
itineraries full of discovery making the Vinoy the perfect starting
point for exploring the best of Tampa Bay.
The Golf Course and Club are just minutes away on Snell Isle.
Our desirable location provides direct access to charming downtown St.
Pete, nearby top-rated white sandy beaches, and the breadth of Tampa
Bay’s vibrant happenings.
Explore more of St. Petersburg and Tampa Bay
here
.
End Mini-Page 605697
End Dynamic Page / ID: 407229

Begin Mini-Page 605688
About The Vinoy
End Mini-Page 605688
Begin Mini-Page 605689
DISCOVER TIMELESS ELEGANCE IN ST. PETERSBURG
Occupying an enviable spot along the waterʼs edge of downtown St.
Petersburg, The Vinoy returns anew as an ever-brilliant beacon and
waterfront landmark. Since 1925, this legendary hotel has been a symbol
of timeless elegance. Combining nuanced nostalgia with modern
sophistication, creating a haven of luxury with contemporary flair, The
Vinoy embodies St. Peteʼs unique charisma and enduring legacy.
We introduce to you the esteemed Vinoy Club. Combining timeless elegance and superior quality, you can become a part of this exclusive community to enjoy the style, tastes and the relaxed yet sophisticated atmosphere of The Vinoy.
End Mini-Page 605689
End Dynamic Page / ID: 407227

Begin Mini-Page 605728
Reciprocal Membership Benefits
End Mini-Page 605728
Begin Mini-Page 605729
As a member of the Vinoy Club, you receive exclusive access and benefits to a number of participating clubs. Whether you are looking at staying at one of our participating Marriott Properties, or playing golf this summer at a nearby club, membership has its advantages.
End Mini-Page 605729
Marriot Reciprocal Club Program
Begin Mini-Page 605962
At a number of our participating Marriott, you will have access to discounts on guest rooms, food and beverage, spa services, fitness golf and tennis.
End Mini-Page 605962
Marriott Golf Reciprocal Program
Begin Mini-Page 605798
As a Golf Member of the Vinoy Club, you receive golf access to over 30 participating Marriott and Ritz Carlton properties.
Benefits include:
Complimentary greens fees
Reciprocal Members pay member rate for each round of golf
Complimentary range balls on the day of play
Advanced tee time reservation privileges
Member Guest Rate is valid for up to three guests, who must be accompanied by a Reciprocal Member
10% discount on merchandise sales
End Mini-Page 605798
Local Summer Golf Reciprocal
Begin Mini-Page 605799
The Local Summer Golf Reciprocal Program allows Golf Members the ability to play golf at a number of golf courses in the local Tampa Bay/Florida West Coast area. Play is normally available from the months of May through October and rates vary from club to club.
End Mini-Page 605799
End Dynamic Page / ID: 407247

About The Vinoy
End Mini-Page 605688
Begin Mini-Page 605689
DISCOVER TIMELESS ELEGANCE IN ST. PETERSBURG
Occupying an enviable spot along the waterʼs edge of downtown St.
Petersburg, The Vinoy returns anew as an ever-brilliant beacon and
waterfront landmark. Since 1925, this legendary hotel has been a symbol
of timeless elegance. Combining nuanced nostalgia with modern
sophistication, creating a haven of luxury with contemporary flair, The
Vinoy embodies St. Peteʼs unique charisma and enduring legacy.
We introduce to you the esteemed Vinoy Club. Combining timeless elegance and superior quality, you can become a part of this exclusive community to enjoy the style, tastes and the relaxed yet sophisticated atmosphere of The Vinoy.
End Mini-Page 605689
